arts.ttl: Newcastle United vs Manchester City – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Newcastle United face a daunting test on Saturday evening as they welcome title-chasing Manchester City to St. James’ Park. Eddie Howe’s side hopes to stop their recent slide. Unfortunately, this poor run has left them in the bottom half of the Premier League table. However, they face a Manchester City side in ominous rhythm.
